column2: possumlips, 45-54 Male  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: I have to take massive doses to get my sugar below 250. I'm talking 100 units of Novolin "N" at night with some Novolin "R" mixed in (40-80 units) and 100 units "N" in the morning with "R" along with a miday injection of "R" anywhere of 30-100 units.The doctor has me on a sliding scale but the puny 3-18 units didn't cut it.What else can i do to get it blood sugar lower but by using more?A1C was 140 last visit.When i used what the doctor told be it stayed in the 400-500 range!I've gained weight since on insulin about 3 years ago up from 280 to 304.I can't exercise because of lower back pain.
